SEARCH
Package org.flick.lang

Class TokenParser

java.lang.Object
org.flick.lang.TokenParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
BytecodeCompilerParser, BytecodeParser
public class TokenParser extends Object
Extendable token parser class which adds basic functionality for generating tokens and token types
Author:
Q
